name: Camsurf: Chat Random & Flirt
description: Camsurf is a free video chat messenger app for making new friends, finding a date or simply meeting random strangers instantly cam to cam.   On Camsurf you can:  Talk to people from 200+ countries   Video chat anonymously without logging in  Instant cam to cam chat with strangers  Filter connections by location and language   And much more   Be Social: Flirt & Date or Find Friends Worldwide  Camsurf is a social network that was created to bring people together from around the world. Since launching in 2015 Camsurf has helped make over a BILLION connections and is now the fastest growing social app for meeting strangers!    Free Random Chat Messenger  Camsurf is already the fastest growing random video chat site on the web and with our brand new Android app you can enjoy all the features of the web-based platform directly from your smartphone. Now you can use the webcam on your smartphone to instantly video chat with thousands of random strangers worldwide!   Connected Worldwide Chat   Camsurf has been downloaded by users in 200+ countries and there are thousands of users online at all times. You can filter connections by country or language and we will instantly match you with strangers based on your preferences. Instantly meet new friends, chat, flirt or even find a date nearby!   Anonymous and Secure  At Camsurf we pride ourselves on security and protecting the personal information of our users. Thats why there are no sign up forms to complete for you to use this app. You can remain anonymous while video chatting in a secure environment.    Moderation & Banning  Camsurf employs dozens of moderators and we ask all of our users to follow the rules and refrain from acting inappropriately while on webcam.
